text: So, let's summarise subjective vs objective analysis. It's very simple. It's all about a balancing act. It's all about ensuring that subjective intuition plus objective market-generated facts equals successful analysis. Make sure you have a balance of the two. It's important to develop opinion, intuition and understanding. But just ensure that you always remain objective, even when you have almost certain opinion, when you feel so confident about something. Just make sure that you're not forgetting your objective understanding of the market. Because it's this objectivity that's going to protect you from many, many pitfalls that a lot of traders make, which cost them very dearly.
